pageProduct.description:

General Information

daily environmental impurities.

Warnings

Avoid Contact with eyes. Not for Internal use.

Common Uses

Moisturising and softening the skin

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Helienthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, PEG-20 Stearate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Cetyl Palmitate, Triethanolamine, Carbomer, Tetrasodium, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance)

Directions

Apply a small amount and gently massage into skin until absorbed. Continue to apply to the body, until the required area has been covered. The Hemp Company Body Lotion can be used as frequently as desired with no oily residue, to moisturise, hydrate and condition skin.
